Text: SSSB Utilities DailyTradingpst SCHRODER SALOMON SMITH BARNEY British Energy CEO Peter Hollins resigned with immediate effect yesterday The company has stated that the resignation does not indicate any deterioration in the outlook for the business performance but rather reflects a desire in the Board for a change in leadership Nevertheless once again British Energy has managed to produce a unpleasant surprise for investors and there will be doubts over future strategy until such time as there is clarity over the management succession Therefore we retain our H Recommendation Under perform High Risk and p price target current price p Seven Trent attached is our note reviewing the preliminary results of Severn Trent SVTL We retain our L Neutral Low Risk Recommendation with a p price target current price p Kelda attached is our note reviewing the preliminary results of Kelda KELL We retain our L Neutral Low Risk Recommendation with a p price target current price p SVT
